alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Searcy; Stone (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 16 at 2:54AM CST until February 16 at 3:30AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Stone County in north central Arkansas... East central Searcy County in north central Arkansas... South central Baxter County in north central Arkansas... * Until 330 AM CST. * At 254 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Elberta, or near Marshall, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Thola... Elberta... Big Flat... Alco... Onia... Fifty-Six... Timbo... Lone Pine... Barkshed Campground... Newnata... Landis... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
